sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react" import "./CareersPage.css" class CareersPage extends Component { render() { return (
Digital Account Manager / Account Executive

Responsibilities

  • meeting and liaising with clients to discuss and identify their pitches requirements
  • working with agency accounts to devise an digital interactive projects/ campaign that meets the client's brief and budget
  • presenting alongside agency colleagues (particularly the account manager), the projects/ campaign ideas and budget to the client
  • liaising with, and acting as the link between, the client and the advertising agency by maintaining regliar contact with both
  • ensuring that communication flows effectively
  • negotiating with clients and agency staff about the details of projects/ campaigns
  • presenting digital ideas / works to clients for approval or modification
  • handling budgets, managing campaign costs and invoicing clients
  • writing client reports
  • monitoring the effectiveness of projects/ campaigns
  • undertaking administration tasks
  • arranging and attending meetings
  • making 'pitches', along with other agency staff, to try to win new business for the agency.

Requirements

  • 1-3 years of working experience in client servicing / accounts role
  • Basic knowledge of technology trends / Hardware systems / Software applications
  • Good understanding and knowledge of social media platforms
  • Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on companyâ€™s success
  • Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
  • Team player
  • Good time-management skills
  • Great interpersonal and communication skills
  • Bachelor in Marketing / Business or similar relevant field
) } } export default CareersPage
